title: OnePlus Nord Buds Review: Tasteful design and exceptional battery life at an affordable price
content:
OnePlus’s Nord smartphones are good-looking, nail the essentials, and are always pocket-friendly. Now OnePlus wants to expand this formula to other products as it seeks to expand the Nord line beyond smartphones. The long-term goal likely involves creating a Nord product ecosystem consisting of earbuds, smartwatches, etc. The OnePlus Nord Buds is the first product

The post OnePlus Nord Buds Review: Tasteful design and exceptional battery life at an affordable price appeared first on XDA.
description: The OnePlus Nord Buds are solid entry-level earbuds with exceptional battery life and a unique design. Read our full review for more details.
